profile:
At Canadian Roofing Company Ltd., we take pride in upholding 
the highest standard of quality & custom workmanship. We have been a family business for over 25 years and endeavor to keep our employees well trained in order to maintain our commitment to you of a job well done.  We are a Toronto based business and as a result only service the outskirts of the GTA by appointment only and for these clients interested in an estimate, there is a fee of $150 + hst which is refundable upon booking with us. It would be our pleasure to provide you with a detailed estimate for the work you are interested in having done. In addition to this, our goal is to answer any questions you may have and to educate you on the entire process, from start to finish. We look forward to hearing from you.

profile:
Serving Toronto and some of the surrounding GTA, No west end services...Like Mississauga Brampton nothing west of Bathurst and the 401.
Mega City Roofing Inc. has attained high standards for re-roofing with many years of experience. Mega City Roofing Inc. has served top-quality products and we strive to be the experts in the business. Our experienced talent and efforts are always continual in our services. We provide information on roofing products and solutions to better our customers requirements.

Mega City Roofing Inc. specializes in re-roofing residential, industrial, and commercial roofs. Even with the best quality roofing systems, your roof is only as good as the quality of the installation. Our excellent product knowledge and highest standards of workmanship assure you of a long-lasting quality roof.

All of our skilled staff is trained in roofing methods, materials, and current Occupational Health and Safety Standards, with many years of actual hands on experience and training. Our service includes inspection, consultation and recommendation of appropriate methods, materials and estimates to resolve our customers individual requirements. We have competitive prices and written guarantee's, customer friendly service and staff. We are fully insured and licensed, our employee's are covered under the WSIB to construct a safe working environment. Call us today and get your FREE estimate inspection and remember a roof is only as good as it's installation. Mega City Roofing Inc. you can trust us for all your roofing needs.

profile:
MCBM Roofing Services is not your typical roofing company. We are a family-owned and operated company, specializing in residential and commercial roof installation, replacement, and repair. Our mantra is to always exceed our customers’ expectations.
Founders Marcelo Sosa and Carolina Quagliata have a passion for providing a high level of service to their clients. With 15 years of roofing experience and 20 years in customer service between them, you are guaranteed exceptional quality workmanship and a lasting relationship built on open and honest communication.
We know how crucial the structural integrity of your roof is. It protects your family and your valuables from the elements, helps make your house more energy efficient, and adds value to your home. That is why we are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality roof construction, at a reasonable price. From the beginning of a project to its completion, we pride ourselves on our high standards, professionalism, and superior results. We deliver on our promises, and we guarantee your satisfaction.

We do all types of Roofs, shingles, flat Roof Top Quality is our priority.High Skillz Roofing Guaranteed Great Jobs. We perform all levels of roofing. We offer start-to-finish solutions for every project. We also make sure that our customers always happy in the end of the job.

***
 
We specialize Roofing, including skylights, if its damaged. We also do small repairs.every small roofing defects can be fixed immediately with in 24 hours emergency service 
High skillz Roofing provides Best clean quality work with over 20 years materials warranty Available to call us you won't be disappoint.We have many years if Roofing experience. 
We guarantee high-quality work for each and every project.

***
 
Installation, removal, replacement and repair roofs of all styles.
Emergency service. Replacing skylights. Fix leaks in roof. High Skillz Roofing has been protecting Residential, Commercial, Industrial and Institutional properties in and around Toronto(GTA) for over 10 years. over all these years, our extreme commitment to excellence and customer service make us one of the most trusted name in the Roofing industry.We have provided our expertise to hundreds of customers and our customer base is forever expanding. Price, Service and Quality have been the foundation of our success.
Our Fashion roofing Shingles department offers residential and commercial services including re-roofing; new roof and retro-fitting, we install a wide range of materials such as asphalt shingles, roofing, composite roof and cedar wood flat roof Our roof department offers complete shingles products and sheet metal work, our crews utilizes state of art tools and equipment to install soffit, fascia, seamless eavestrough and rainware accessories.
Bonded and Insured Workplace Safety and Insurance Board(WSIB).We provide 10 years labour warranty . Promise To do Great job.

profile:
Established in 1976, Luc's Roofing is a family owned roofing business that has been servicing the GTA for over 40 years. 
We offer shingle roofing and flat roofing services, plus low-slope, cedar and slate roofing.
 
Our goal is to ensure each and every customer has the security of a job well done. 
That's why we stress superior products, superior workmanship and superior service. 

Our motto, "We've got your peace of mind covered," guides all our activities and we work hard to live up to it! 

Please visit our website at www.lucsroofing.com
416-222-2672

We are following all provincial guidelines for Covid-19.

profile:
For over 15 years Smart Roofing Inc. has provided full service roofing for residential, commercial and industrial customers throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Our skilled, experienced craftsmen, aided by the reliable products, can accurately assess your roofing situation and expedite any job quickly and to your full satisfaction. 

We are dedicated to providing quality, professional installation and service commitment with fair prices. For your protection we are fully insured, bonded and licensed, and are proud members of the Better Business Bureau. We offer from 6 to 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship and only experienced crews of roofers are used. Smart Roofing has maintained these standards over the years and will continue to do such as our family of satisfied customers grows and shares their experience with peers, family and friends. 

Please contact us today for a free estimate or visit our showroom. At Smart Roofing Inc. "We protect what you value most". Make the SMART choice.
_____________________________________________

profile:
Imperial Roofs were awarded the Vaughan Citizen Readers Choice Award in 2011

In 1968 my father founded Cel Marchildon Roofing, which has grown into the company we have today.  Through commitment to excellence in our workmanship and materials we have built our reputation of TOTAL CUSTOMER SATISFACTION by providing our customers with the BEST ROOFING SYSTEM that will accommodate their needs and budget.  We will provide you, our valued customer, with a detailed assessment that will outline the specific requirements for your home. 

Our expert staff is committed to providing you with the BEST ROOFING EXPERIENCE available in the GTA.  All workers are covered by WORKERS COMPENSATION.  Our company is fully LICENSED AND INSURED to provide you with a WORRY FREE ROOFING EXPERIENCE.  We DO NOT USE ROOFING SUB-CONTRACTORS.  All work is performed by our expert employees. 

This may or may not be your first time purchasing a new roof, however we would like to outline some of the key factors in our operating process:

?	Provide a copy of our Insurance Certificate
?	Provide a copy of Workplace Insurance Safety Board Certificate upon request
?	Provide a copy of our Operating License 
?	Protect your home and surrounding area from falling debris
?	Tear off all old shingles to the roof deck
?	Inspect the wood deck for rotting and warping areas
?	Install eave protection to all insulated eaves 
?	Install name brand shingles with your choice 25 years to limited lifetime guarantee
?	Install proper ventilation to the roof (1sq ft for every 300 sq ft of attic floor area) 
?	Install new metal flashing where needed or refurbish to “new” standards
?	Install closed valleys with aluminum underneath to ensure maximum protection 
?	Full property clean up using magnetic sweeps and trailers to ensure no driveway damage
?	All employees are Fall Safety accredited and Crew Chief First Aid and CPR trained

Services We Provide:
*Asphalt Shingle Replacement
*Gutters, Soffit & Fascia
*Siding - Vinyl, Aluminum
*Leaf Screen for Eavestroughs
*Rooftop Snow & Ice Dam Removal
*Roof Repairs
*Roof Evaluations
*Cedar Shakes
*Slate Roofs
*Insurance Claims
*Ventilation Upgrades

profile:
Integrity Roofers is a licensed, certified and insured roofing company serving residential and commercial property owners in Toronto and the GTA.

Grounded in our ethics and principles, as people and as a company, we provide roofing services that are professionally executed and fairly priced.

Industry Credentials
Certified by CertainTeed, Integrity Roofers’ contractors are certified Quality Masters and Shingle Applicators.  We bring 20 years of roofing experience to the table, with the required knowledge and expertise to provide quality roof installations, repairs, and replacements.  With $2,000,000 in liability insurance, both your home and our contractors are covered for any unforeseen or unlikely incidents that may occur on the job.

Friendly and Approachable
Integrity Roofers’ contractors are pleasant to work with and open to hearing any questions or concerns you may have.  We are here to serve you in the best way possible, offering educational and practical tips wherever we can to extend the longevity of your roofing system.

profile:
At Leading on Edge Roofing we strive to be complete in every aspect. Whether it be a repair, roof replacement or emergency service, our thorough attention to detail covers your roofing needs completely. We provide in house metal fabricating and have strategic alliances with electrical and plumbing contractors for a complete range of related services. Our insistence on safety training for our employees and in taking measures on-site means that your people and ours enjoy a safe working environment. Along with our reputation for honesty and standing behind our work, we believe in good communication so you know how your job is coming. Complete job, complete assurance, complete satisfaction.    

CLEAN:

Although Clean is not a word normally associated with the roofing industry, it describes our company in more ways than one. Our “clean site” program ensures your facility will be kept tidy for the duration of the job. We go the extra mile, pressure washing, sweeping, raking etc. to ensure that our customers are satisfied. And when it comes to relationships - clean means integrity. Its how we treat our suppliers, our employees and of course our customers. Rest assured that everything we do is responsible, legal and safe. In short, we care.

COSTS EFFECTIVE: 
At Leading on Edge Roofing we believe in fairness and respect. We only recommend the services you need. From a brand new roof to our annual service programs, we are committed to providing you with cost effective solutions to meet all your roofing needs! We choose only durable quality products for our experienced and efficient team to apply, ensuring your roof is done right. “Done right” means longer lasting. Now that’s saving you money and headaches.

COVID 19 UPDATE: We are open for business and here to assist with all of your roofing needs. Feel free to call, email, message us through the profile and virtual meetings are available. A + Roofing is following all the health and safety percautions as set out by the Province to ensure our employees and customers are safe. 

***

When choosing our company, we guarantee a professional and experienced team member to assess your needs. Our representative will explain how we can help you and offer you an honest and fair quote. Our team of professional roofers is fully insured, and licensed work is stamped with written labour warranty for 10 years; a commitment that truly shows our confidence and credence in our work.

A + Roofing Canada Inc. provides quality and professional service around GTA and its surroundings. Feel free to contact us for more information

A + Roofing has an ever-expanding list of building products, including roofing products for residential, flat, and commercial roofs, lumber, moldings, doors, replacement windows, vinyl siding so many other products that we have everything necessary to complete every project on your list.

A + Roofing is a true mom-and-pop store started as a small distributor of commercial roofing products in the backyard of its president's home. Ever since, we've been expanding, thanks to our loyal customers.

profile:
At Global One Roofing, we only employ skilled tradespeople who are certified to do their job. All of our crew members are full-time, trained and certified employees. We maintain a meticulous cleanup policy on every job site. We have insurance and WSIB Coverage. We also offer roof inspections and a full line of repair services. Save money, increase your home energy rating, improve the comfort inside your home and help the environment. Emergency and temporary repair services are available around the clock. 
 
Global One Roofing has been in operation since 2005 and is a family operated business. Over that time we have seen changes in materials and methods but maintain our original commitment to providing high quality results for our clients. 
 
We stand behind our work with one of the best warranties in the business, 10 years. This is only possible as a result of three things: the use of premium products, good workmanship and careful inspection of completed work.

profile:
City roofing and aluminum co. has been in business since 1994, over all these years, our extreme commitment to excellence and customer service make us one of the most trusted name in the roofing industry.
Our roofing department offers residential and commercial services including re-roofing; new roof construction and retro-fitting, we install a wide range of materials such as asphalt shingles, metal roofing, composite roof and cedar wood shakes.
Our aluminum department offers complete aluminum product.s and sheet metal work, our crews utilizes state of art tools and equipment to install aluminum soffit, fascia, seamless eavestrough and rainware accessories.
What’s more, in addition to providing re-roofing services and new construction work, we also offer roofing repair services, on-going maintenance service, and roofing inspection consultations.  These services are designed to extend the life of your roof by identifying and fixing the minor problems before they become major issues.
name: City Roofing & Aluminum Co.

profile:
Re-Roofing Ontario is a family owned and operated roofing and home improvement company servicing the Greater Toronto Area.  Our expertise includes residential and commercial projects, maintenance and repair of existing roof systems, the installation of seamless gutters and advanced fastening systems and all types of custom aluminum and copper work.

Over the years, the reputation of roofers throughout the Greater Toronto area has suffered due to poor installers, the use of inferior quality materials, and the start up of fly-by-night companies.  It is our goal to revitalize the roofing industry's reputation, by providing the highest quality service and products for our customers.

We take your needs as seriously as you do.  From the smallest leak to a complete re-roofing project, we deliver the same professionalism, dedication and quality. We believe our service and quality provides our customers with piece of mind in knowing that the roof they are purchasing will provide superior weather protection today and for many years to come.
 
Call us for a free quote today at (416) 899-4518! Requests can also be made through our website.

profile:
Mint Roofing Ltd. is a professional roofing contractor that serves residential and commercial property owners in Durham and York Regions.
Our firm is fully licensed, certified and insured. We carry over $ 5 million of liability coverage which provides our clients and contractors peace of mind and protection.

Our team of trained consultants have over 30 years of industry experience and have proudly served thousands of clients across the GTA including home owners, business owners, engineer firms, restoration and insurance companies.

Our business model is a simple one however we mean every word

-  Provide honest advice and exceptional service
-  Keep our promises EVERY time
-  Only install high quality products that provide our clients warranty coverage and protection
- Treat our clients and their homes with unparalleled respect
  
  Do all of these things for an affordable and fair price 
 
Mint Roofing Ltd. have the knowledge, experience and capacity to tackle any roofing, siding, eavestrough or insulation project. 
The team members are easy to work with and respect our clients busy schedules, we will make every effort to meet you at a time that is convenient for you.
We welcome the opportunity to meet with you to review your project, answer any questions or concerns that you have, and ensure that you are educated and comfortable with the products, offerings and options that we recommend for your home or business.

We hope to serve you soon, for more information please visit our website or contact us by phone today

profile:
Gamma Roofing started off as a small locally owned business here in the GTA. Over the years, the exceptional quality of our workmanship as well as our top notch customer service has made us one of most renowned company to service southern central Ontario. 

Our dedication to the craft has generated us a large client base in both residential and commercial roofing. What differentiates us from our competitors is the experience of our workers in the field, our competitive pricing, our flexible scheduling, as well as our commitment to our work.

We currently offer a wide array of roofing related services, including shingle roof repair and replacements, flat roofs, eaves trough repair and replacements, soffits and fascia, skylight replacements. We also cater to new constructions and townhouse co-ops. We prioritize the safety of both our workers as well as you and your family,  and are fully insured and bonded. We also offer 10 years warranty for all our services. 
   
Our service includes:
Roofing/ Re-Roofing/ Roof Repairs 
Shingle / Flat / Metal Roofs
Fixing Roof Leak/ Roof Repair / Maintenance 
Eavestrough / Downspouts Replacement
Soffit / Fascia Replacement
Skylight Replacement
Siding Installation
Insulation Replacement

profile:
1 2 3 Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets 1 2 3 Roofing contractors apart.

We hold the accreditation of CertainTeed Shingle Master with CertainTeed St. Gobain, the world leader in shingle manufacturing. The stringent guidelines mandated by CertainTeed in the application of their product allows us to maintain the exceedingly high standards we are reputed for as roofers. 

123 Roofing services South Western Ontario, from Kitchener/Waterloo through, Hamilton, Halton, North York, Vaughan and into Barrie with sloped and flat roofing system replacements, eavestrough, skylight, shingles and attic insulation and ventilation work being our specialities.

Call today and one of our roofing systems consultants will be happy to help!

profile:
Reayou Roofing is a team of specialist Torontonian roofers who understand the city’s weather and atmosphere. Their output is built to last harsh winters, as a result.

They’re also certified and insured. That matters because unlike plumbing, roofing is an unregulated industry.

Therefore, it’s vital to hire a team that is certified and insured. You wouldn’t want to end up paying more in repairs for a weak roof later!

Another positive point about them when it comes to cost-efficiency is that Reayou l doesn’t have unreasonable charges even for custom roofing. This is based on what we’ve seen of past project quotes.

And whether you need a new roof or your current one needs an upgrade, Reayou doesn’t shy away from any project, however complex. Their estimates are given free and upfront, so you’re not up all night worrying about how much this new roof is going to cost you.

There might be a chance that you don’t even need to get your roof replaced entirely, actually. Reayou doesn’t always push clients to spend on new roofing, especially if you’re a homeowner on a tight budget.

Pros

Affordable
Extensive services
Free quotes upfront
Works fast

profile:
Exterior Contracting Company serving Aurora, Newmarket, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Vaughan and the Rest of York Region. 
Our Services include Roofing Projects, Roof Repairs, Eavestrough, Soffit and Fascia Installation, Siding and more to give your house the WOW Factor. 

Preferred Contractor Status for Owens Corning Products and BP Canada Certified Contractor.

We Hire only Expert Installers ready to make your project an easy one. 

About Us: 

Sara Prince has been an Executive Project Manager and Senior Client Satisfaction Specialist for an award-winning roofing company in York Region since 2015. She has taken her knowledge and expertise in the industry to develop Principal Roofing Exterior Contractors as President. Her leadership and experience, paired with her team of experienced, highly-rated roofing professionals, and administration staff, bring trust and meticulous work standards to customers in the York Region area.
“In addition to having an amazing team of contractors that do meticulous and amazing work, we also pride ourselves on communication and time management on our projects. This paired with an outstanding level of workmanship is what customers are looking for and why my services are always highly recommended.” – Sara Prince, President

Principal Roofing and Exteriors offers a strong team of estimators who bring years of experience, a wealth of knowledge, problem-solving skills and cost savings solutions to the table for Principal customers, providing a transparent, whole family service approach to their business. York Region homeowners can experience the award-winning service that is expected from Sara and her team.

Principal specializes in Re-Roofs, Roof Repairs, Custom metal flashings, soffit, fascia, trough and siding in addition to supporting with product selections and product warranty options.

profile:
Hello and thank you for visiting Ontario Ceritified Roofings Homestars profile ! If you have a single shingle missing and need it repaired or a full exterior remodel we are here to provide the best service possible at the highest quality in a resonable timeframe. No job is too big or too small for us and we treat all jobs and clients with the same professionalism and respect. 

Ontario Certified roofing consists of a 7 man crew that lives in the Newmarket, Keswick area and dont mind travelling for our clients. We have a mature crew ranging from 27-39 with combined experience of over 30 years. Quality workmanship is our first and foremost goal with cleanliness and professionalism being a close 2nd. We tend to impress our customers with our laid back atmosphere our crew provides while providing quick work of most roofs taking 1 day. 

Property protection and clean up are very important to us we always have multiple pieces of plywood in the trailer to protect windows, doors and other landscape as well as tarps to collect debris and protect the ground as well as multiple magnetic sweepers to ensure all nails make it off the property. We are industry leaders in our cleanup technique and have not had a single complaint !

We bring professionalism to a new level with detailed digital quotes as well as contracts and invoicing and in most cases make a site visit to guarantee there are no surprise costs. We use dump trailers for most jobs so a bin is not inconviently infront of your house for days and show up on the day we schedule !

We use only the highest quality materials for our projects with our preference being Owens Corning or GAF shingles and we warranty all our work through the manufacturer. 

I appreciate you taking the time to read our company description and hope you decide to choose Ontario Certified Roofing !
services: re-roofs, new construction, repairs, soffit fascia, carpentry, counter and wall flashing, re caulk, caulking,

profile:
With over 30 years experience, Masonry Doctors are a leading masonry contractor in Toronto. Our services include Chimney Builds & Repairs, Roofing, Guttering, All Masonry Services, Patios, Walkways, Stairs, Steps, Basement & Foundation.

Browse through Masonry Doctors latest masonry, chimney, and concrete projects. Take a look at our recent work and see for yourself the quality of work we provide. Contact us today for a FREE estimate!

Do you need to have your existing outdoor masonry features repaired? Turn to the professionals from Masonry Doctors for all  your masonry restoration needs.

Protect your landscape from the effects of flooding by having custom-designed retaining walls installed by our professionals. Call for your service.

If you love spending time outdoors, a patio is a must-have feature for your home. The team from Masonry Doctors can custom-design a patio for you.

The skilled masons from Masonry Doctors can install decorative stairs for your landscape. We can also repair your damaged steps. Call for more details.

Whether you have damaged concrete or a cracked foundation, the team from Masonry Doctors can repair it for you. Get 15% OFF our services.

Veneer facades and pillars can transform the appearance of any property. Trust us to upgrade your home with quality pillars and columns. Request a call back today!

Rely on the professionals at Masonry Doctors for all of your foundation and basement repair needs. Hire us today and get 15% OFF all our foundation or basement services.

Whether you need chimney rebuilding, repairing, or repointing services, Masonry Doctors does it all. Contact us today for a FREE estimate.

Our experts work with all roofing material and installation types. So, whether your roof is flat or pitched; on a home or commercial property, we are your best choice.

Sun Tunnel
A solar tunnel is a natural daylighting tubular system that allows any dark room to be transformed into a bright vivid area. The sunlight is captured by the dome assembly on the roof, and then travels through a reflective tube. The light is carried through the tube and provides daylight to the area below.

profile:
Amazon Roofing has provided quality roofing to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Amazon Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Amazon Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!

You can count on us:
The price is right~~

OUR STORY
Full Service Roofing Provide

TD ROOFING INC is fully licensed, insured to provide Commercial, Residential and Industrial services throughout Ontario. 
The fully certified Roofing professionals are able to complete anything from the most complex and large-scale construction projects to the smallest Roofing repairs.


At TD ROOFING INC we are driven by our commitment to excellence and always go above and beyond to make sure our clients are completely satisfied with our Roofing work. Our attention to details is what sets us apart from other companies in the business.

If you are looking for an Ontario Commercial, Industrial, Residential Roofing Company with experienced, well trained roofing professionals, where the owner is working first hand, shoulder to shoulder with all his team in every stage of the project, TD ROOFING INC is the right choice. We only use high quality materials and offer very competitive pricing.

We supply and install all of the following systems for flat, sloped and metal roofing:

Multi-ply (BUR/SBS)

Single-ply (TPO/PVC)

Shingles (asphalt/cedar/slate)

Residential metal work accessories

Metal Siding

specialities:
Asphalt shingles are the most commonly used system on sloped roofs. Asphalt shingles are in a wide variety of colors, styles and shapes. Asphalt shingles developments in durability and performance plus a professional installment ...

COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL

Built-Up Roofing system (BUR) is one of the oldest and most reliable commercial roofing systems. These roof systems often referred to as "tar and gravel" roofs. BUR consists of multiply plies of roof felts laminated together with bitumen ...

METAL SIDING

A residential roofing system must be outfitted with a metal soffit, fascia, eaves trough and downpipe. The soffit exists at the perimeter of the roof allowing air to pass through the roof structure for necessary ventilation. The fascia flashes the perimeter.

profile: At one point in their life, homeowners will have to deal with roofing problems, be it through repair and renovation or during the initial roof installation. It is one of those housing problems that are almost impossible to ignore for both the residential and commercial homeowners. Nobody would be comfortable living in a house with leaking or collapsing roof; it is not only dangerous to your life, your loved ones or your tenants, but also unhygienic and unhealthy. Also. there have been a lot of reported cases of tenants suing landlords/ladies for damages due to such eventualities, trust me you don’t want to be part of it. You, therefore, need a roofing partner who will always be there with you at every step of your home improvement process; that’s where Sparkle Roofing contractors come in.

profile:
Why Replace? ...We Can Repair!
Our Roofing Repairs Company has been serving the GTA Since 1990!

Professional & Reliable Service with People you can Trust  .
When you have a leaking roof, why replace the whole thing when a repair will do? Get an assessment by Roofing Repairs Company! Specializing in roof repair services in Toronto since 1990, we enjoy fixing any residential or commercial roof in the GTA. We enjoy helping people save money instead of spending thousands. When you call, you’ll deal directly with the owner who also does the repairs – 24 hours a day, 7 days a week if needed. All our work comes with a written guarantee, every time. For more information or to schedule your repair, e-mail or call today!



Unmatched Service 
At Roofing Repairs Company, we provide a prompt follow-up on every job. When you call us, you’ll get an immediate response. We can repair on the spot, giving you same-day service when possible. We also provide preventative services. When a raccoon or squirrel gets in your attic, we’ll get him out, seal his entrance and animal-proof your home. Shingles, chimneys or eaves damaged by wind, hail or age? We’ll fix them all! Choose us to install gutter guards and we’ll clean the eaves too!



Specializing in Roofing Repairs Since 1990. 
Roofing Repairs Company provides unmatched service in residential and commercial roof repairs. Our company repairs a vast amount of roofing problems while providing our customers the opportunity to repair, as opposed to a complete new roof. Most of our customers have animal damage from raccoons or squirrels. A large amount of customers call us for leaks due to chimney flashings, skylights, wind damage, soffit and fascia, venting, valleys, eavestrough resloping and flat roof leaks. We gear our company towards solving all types of roof leaks. We serve the public 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, offering emergency and same-day service with on-the-spot repairs. Having a roof that is leaking is an important problem we make sure to solve. We meet the needs of our customers and prolong the life of the roof at a lower cost.

Promotions and Special Offers.
​
Receive a Free Sloping and Eaves Cleaning with Gutter Guard Installation

Every Job Comes with a Written Guarantee

Free Estimates

profile:
ABOUT SHANDYMAN CONTRACTING

ShandyMan Contracting is one of Toronto's most trusted General Contractors, specializing in Roofing, Painting and Carpentry & Renovations.

Whether it be a commercial or residential design or repair, The ShandyMan Team prides themselves on their results and happy customers.

CORE VALUES

PEOPLE
This core value runs deep in the Shand family - passed down from Shane’s father who worked very hard to leave a legacy worth following. You can see it on the faces of friends, family, employees and customers of ShandyMan Contracting Inc. Love and leadership is at the centre of this organization.

PASSION
One has to be passionate about their craft in order to be successful in this business - it can be tough and the work isn’t always pretty. For anyone who’s ever worked with "The ShandyMan", the first thing you’ll notice is his passion for life, family and work. Passion is wildly reflected in ShandyMan Contracting’s long lasting relationships and successful projects across the Greater Toronto Area.

PURPOSE
Founder, Shane Shand truly believes in living a life of purpose and meaning. ShandyMan Contracting provides that opportunity for its employees through the example Shane and his team have been setting from an early age. Growing up in Toronto’s Beaches, and learning from his father, he now brings over 20 years of experience as a General Contractor with key specialities. Shane is now able to live out his own dream through the art of enhancing commercial and residential properties.

SHANE SHAND
FOUNDER & PRESIDENT

THE SHANDYMAN STORY
MEET OUR FOUNDER & PRESIDENT SHANE SHAND THE "SHANDYMAN"
Born and raised in Toronto's Beaches Community, Shane and his team bring over 20 years of experience in residential and commercial General Contracting. ShandyMan Contracting services a variety of clients across the Greater Toronto Area and beyond. Specialties include; roofing, painting and carpentry. ShandyMan's mission, vision and core values are the guide to transforming your space.

EVERY DAY IS A BLESSED DAY.

https://www.facebook.com/ShandymanContracting/

profile:
PerfectHomes Roofing is  a full service residential roofing company specializing in roof  repair and replacement. Our experienced team of roofing professionals can  handle any residential  roofing project. Whether you need to repair or replace your roof on your  single family home, townhome, or any other type of residential building, we can  and will get the job done. We are equipped to handle large/small roofing  projects in Toronto, Markham and most of the GTA area.


 We understand that every roof is different. Each home has a unique set of considerations to factor into a repair, re-shingling, or replacement project. This is why we take the time to fully understand your roofing needs before recommending a course of action. We can help you choose the best roofing solution possible

We’re a full-service roofing and landscaping contractor with more than 10 years working experience.

Our major roofing services include, but are not limited to:
- Free Estimate
- Roof repair and replacement
- Flat & shingled roofing
- Skylight repair and replacement
- Gutter & eavestrough repair and replacement
- Attic ventilation & insulation
- Chimney installation and repair
- Aluminum work

Our major landscaping services include, but are not limited to:
- Free Estimate
- Interlocking (driveway, pathway, entrance, patio, pool deck, etc.)
- Retaining walls
- Fencing (wood, vinyl, metal, etc.)
- Sodding & mulching

Our features:
• Full inspection
• Installation of high-quality materials
• WSIB guaranteed working place
• Licensed company
• Professional team
• High efficient work
• 15 years workmanship warranty for complete roof installation
• 2 years workmanship warranty for complete interlocking installation
• 24-hour maintenance response guarantee

profile: Established in 2010, Roof For Life is a best-in-class provider of metal roof manufacturing and installation services in southern Ontario. By manufacturing our own high-quality materials and fielding a team of professional installers, we have an unrivaled capability to control the quality of our finished product from start to finish. With a customer-first approach, we provide clients with an immense opportunity for customization, while ensuring that our workers abide exactly to the agreed contract and all safety regulations. Our 100% recyclable German-made premium steel and Canadian quality assurance & control standards make our company the #1 choice for metal roofing contractors and all environmentally conscious consumers. By providing all clients with a transferable warranty of up to 55 years, we have full confidence in the quality of our materials and craftsmanship.

Our roof refurbishment process

The customer selects ‘Shingle’ which refers to the “Asphalt shingle”. Most of our roofs are used in this process. Previously mainly used a triple old fashioned tile. What is the latest process using an Architectural for 30 years? First of all, to remove the previous tile on the roof, you discovered that Shingle is just the “skin” of the roof, and there is a layer of Underlayment below it. “paper”. It is mainly used for waterproofing. Like Shingle, the paper and Shingle are already firmly glued together. In addition, there are chimneys and vents on the roof. There are waterproof boards under them. The name Flashing is linked to Paper and Shingle. Therefore, it is also necessary to “eradicate” together. After shovelling it off, the bone on the roof is left. It is a deck. The wooden boards on the roof are also divided into solid wood and plywood. If any rotten boards are found and there are holes in the boards, they must be replaced or replaced first. Then go in the opposite direction and begin to spread new paper on the board. In order not to let the rain drop down the eaves, we will install a drip rim “Drip Eidge” along the eaves. Then start Shingle from the bottom of the eaves. From bottom to top, from the right to the left, a piece of cloth, this is a repetitive work, meet the vents, to replace the flashing. Finally, the completion of the Ridge cap was nearly completed. Also note that in addition to paving tiles neatly, the main job is nailing, which is to hit the nails. The nails are good enough to play T deep and play tight. The most prone to problems are the protruding roofs, double inspections of the exhausts and chimneys, the cleaning of roof tile sinks after the replacement of roof parts, and the ground cleaning. Completing the photo shoot of the roof after the completion of the old and new contrast and key waterproof pictures send text messages to the owners to stay at the end of ten years of maintenance.

What refurbishment roof package?

It is a kind of roof roof total cost calculated by calculating the total roof area X using the number of roof tiles. You can measure your own roof quotation by yourself. profile:
Top Level Roofing provides residential and commercial roofing services in Toronto and all of the GTA. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
We offer top quality roofing, shingle replacement and small roofing repairs. We also repair skylights, metal flashing and eavestroughs. We assure a responsible, professional and upstanding services. Our goal is to meet top level standards and technical skills to ensure customer satisfaction. We are a successful, positive and fun team who has been working together for over ten years.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
We are fully insured by the WSIB. Safety always comes first. 
​---------------------------------------------------------------------------
We give 15 years of warranty on our work, and only use top quality products. We guarantee top quality work, complete satisfaction and the best prices on the market.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you are thinking about improving your house, request an estimate from Top Level Roofing right now!
